## ArcSinNode class

Computes the arcsine (inverse sine) function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ArcSinNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns asin(x) in radians for input x in the range \[-1, 1\]. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
